attributes.action:
Stage a diplomatic boycott of the 2022 Winter Olympics
in Beijing
attributes.additional_details:
Over a million innocent Uyghur people have been
locked up in the education camps in Xinjiang where
they endure forced labor, torture, and sterilization.
Beijing also breached the Sino-British Joint Declaration
by introducing Extradition Law, leading to 2 million
people protested on the street over 6 months and
thousands of cases of "Suicide" claimed by the local
authorities.
attributes.background:
We would hope the government to send a strong
message to Communist China and the world that the
UK stands up against the Chinese totalitarian regime
and condemns the Chinese Communist Party (the
CCP) for its genocide behavior to the Uyghurs and its
unlawful oppression of the people in Hong Kong
